open.title: No Connectivity | TTConnect Afrihost Network | Gauteng
open.description: We are investigating reports of no connectivity affecting clients on the TT Connect and Afrihost network. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologise for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

updates.content: Afrihost engineers have resolved the issue and we are currently monitoring for stability, if you are still experiencing issues, please restart your Fibre router.
We are observing further impact. Affected clients will experience no connection. Afrihost engineers are working on resolving the issue as soon as possible. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
Afrihost engineers are investigating additional impact. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
Afrihost engineers have resolved the issue and we are currentlyÂ monitoring for stability, if you are still experiencing issues, please restart your Fibre router.
